name: Echoes of Kai Anders
description:
Kai Anders is missing. You need to find her. Use your empathy enhancement chip to discover clues by reading the brain waves of the last person to be seen with her. Will you be able to figure out the puzzle in this Neon Noir Visual Novel? Created at Global Game Jam 2017.

Credits:
Adia Alderson - Programming
Sara Fe - Sound Design and Musical Score
Beth Korth - Narrative
Stephen McGregor - Production
Charlie Mackin - Environmental Art
Troy Strand - Musical Score
Abdiwak Yohannes - Character Art
